member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationLogonMode
member.summary: The logon mode for impersonation

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationLogonMode.Automatic
member.summary: Automatic logon

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationLogonMode.Explicit
member.summary: Explicit logon

member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the context impersonation during tool execution

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationOptions.CurrentUserImpersonation
member.summary: A flag indicating if the tool should impersonate the current user during execution. By default this property is false.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationOptions.Username
member.summary: The name of the user to logon before execution. The and properties must also be set. This property has priority over the property. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationOptions.Domain
member.summary: The user Windows domain name. This property together with property define the user to logon before execution. If the user is not part of a Windows domain the machine name can be used. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationOptions.Password
member.summary: The password of the user specified by and properties. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.ContextImpersonationOptions.LogonMode
member.summary: The logon mode of the user before execution. This property has effect only when a username for impersonation is specified. The default logon mode is automatic.

member.summary: The PDF to Image constructor

member.returns: The number of pages in PDF document

member.summary: Gets the number of pages of a PDF document in a stream

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.ConvertPdfPagesToImageInEvent(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all the pages of a PDF file to image objects and raises the event immediately after a PDF page was converted. The event handler argument contains a reference to resulted image object. You are responsible for disposing the resulted image object by calling its method when it is not needed anymore
member.param: The full path of the PDF file to be converted

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.ConvertPdfPagesToImageInEvent(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Converts all the pages of PDF document in a stream to image objects and raises the event immediately after a PDF page was converted. The event handler argument contains a reference to resulted image object. You are responsible for disposing the resulted image object by calling its method when it is not needed anymore
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to be converted

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.ConvertPdfPagesToImageInEvent(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts all the pages in a PDF document to image objects and raises the event immediately after a PDF page was converted. The event handler argument contains a reference to resulted image object. You are responsible for disposing the resulted image object by calling its method when it is not needed anymore
member.param: The memory buffer containing the PDF document to be converted

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.ConvertPdfPagesToImageInEvent(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the pages of a PDF file to image objects starting from a given PDF page number to the end of the PDF document and raises the event immediately after a PDF page was converted. The event handler argument contains a reference to resulted image object. You are responsible for disposing the resulted image object by calling its method when it is not needed anymore
member.param: The full path of the PDF file to be converted

member.summary: Converts the pages of a PDF document in a stream to image objects starting from a given PDF page number to the end of the PDF document and raises the event immediately after a PDF page was converted. member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to be converted

member.summary: The maximum time allowed for this tool to run

member.summary: The user password to be used to open a password protected PDF document

member.summary: Gets or sets the license key string received from vendor. If this property is null the tool will automatically enter in evaluation mode

member.summary: The impersonation options used during tool execution

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.PdfToolFullPath
member.summary: Sets the full path of the .dat helper file. By default this file is expected to be found in the same folder with .dll assembly.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.PdfDocumentInfo
member.summary: Gets the object encapsulating the PDF document properties. This objects is populated after tool execution finished

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.ColorSpace
member.summary: The color space of the resulted images. The default value is RGB

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToImage.PdfToImageConverter.Resolution
member.summary: The resolution in DPI of the resulted images. The default value is 150
